resource.chars:
Military 1844 Department 
No 4
Extract from the Minutes 
of Consultation.
23rd January 1844.
Referred to in Mily. Letter to 
England dated 26th March 1844
No 16 Para 1
Observing that Lieutt Ludlow,
Superintendent of the Magnetic ob-
servatory of Madras, appears to have 
used his best exertions to attain the 
object of his journey to the Southward.
Recd via Southampton 
11th May 1844.
